https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/toB9yjJssyJZSworX0KePbjSexP.jpg Paul is a down-on-his-luck screenwriter who picks up a drifter and offers him a place to stay. However, when the deranged stranger takes Paul hostage and forces him to write, their unhinged relationship brings buried secrets to light. Black Butterfly
